SOL_MARS_CYDONIA.message: Home of the core systems champion gravball team, the Little Green Men.

SOL_EARTH_LONDON.message: Traditional center of civilization. Has recovered quite well after last centurys flooding disasters, although many of the cultural landmarks will never be restored to their former glory.

SOL_EARTH_MOSCOW.message: Moscow Spaceflight museum is a must see! See how it all started, including an actual moon lander recovered from the moon! Beware of hawkers selling moon rocks for souvenirs, often buying a ticket to the moon is cheaper.

SOL_EARTH_OLYMPUS.message: Dont forget to enjoy the longest ski slope within a hundred lightyears!

SOL_EARTH_SHANGHAI.message: Industrial powerhouse of Earth. Dont forget your hazmat suit if you want to venture outside.
